There was only one mention of Unicron in that paragraph, Cyber.  And it was a 
joke.  Everyone, please do not continue with acknowledgements, just shut up.  
The e-mails just pile up from this crap, and it's sickening going through 
over 70 e-mails for not being around for a few hours, and 20-30 of the 
e-mails are crap not involving the RPG.

Lord U.
KSLawDogg@...
